Note that the target element context `Invoice.lineItem.chargeItem[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Invoice.lineItem`. Element `Invoice.lineItem.chargeItem[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Invoice.lineItem.chargeItem[x]`, but has no comparisons. Note that the target element context `Invoice.lineItem.chargeItem[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Invoice.lineItem`.

name: R5InvoiceElementMapToR4
title: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Invoice to FHIR R4 Invoice
description: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 Invoice to FHIR R4.
